analyzed: re jig dang por sngags ba bde ba stan la nye ba gnas shing gdod ba gtsang spra la sogs ba byed ba

analyzed: de steng du yi ge hr: dkar po

original: / de'i 'od zer gyis bskul la mdun @175b gyi nam mkha' la bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa spyan drangs la /
analyzed: de d zer gyis skul la mdun gyi nam mkha la bla ma dang sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa la sogs ba spyan drangs la

original: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis legs par mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa yang bya ste /
analyzed: snying ga sa bon gyi d zer las byung ba mchod ba sprin gyis legs ba mchod cing sdig ba chags ba la sogs ba dang tshangs ba gnas bzhi bsgom ba yang byed ste

original: de nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya zhing /
analyzed: de nas stong ba nyid bsgom ba byed zhing

original: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya ba'o //
analyzed: aom stong ba nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no zhes byed ba dis byin gyis brlab ba byed ba

original: de'i rjes la sngar bzhin du yi ge hr'i: rnam par bsgoms la nam mkha'i dkyil na spros shing bsdu bar yang byas la /

original: de las nges par byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de las nges ba byung ba jig rten dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsgom ba byed ste
